title: ACT Government Hit by Cyber Security Breach
description: Federal prosecutors alleged an employee affiliated with Russia’s defense ministry installed 'back doors' in computer systems and deployed malware aimed at crippling the safety of energy facilities. (Dreamstime/TNS)
